nav.t-attf-class: navbar navbar-light navbar-expand-lg border py-0 mb-2 o_portal_navbar {{classes if classes else ''}} {{'mt-3 rounded' if breadcrumbs_searchbar else 'border-top-0' }}

div.class: nav flex-column flex-lg-row ml-auto p-0 mb-3 mb-lg-0 mt-1 mt-lg-0

div.t-attf-class: table-responsive border rounded border-top-0 #{classes if classes else ''}
container container--small tab-pane fade #{'in active' if tabinfo == 'personal_data' else ''}

li.label: Year of issuance of driving license:

a.class: a-submit btn btn-secondary mb16 btn-block user_shipping_address_add
a-submit btn btn-secondary mb16 btn-block user_shipping_address_add

div.t-attf-class: container container--small tab-pane fade #{'in active' if tabinfo == 'vehicle' else ''}
container container--small tab-pane fade #{'in active' if tabinfo == 'nomination' else ''}

div.class: container custom-tab-edit-mode container--small tab-pane fade in active

select.name: country_id
select.t-att-class: 'custom-select form-control has-value' if country else 'custom-select form-control'

div.t-att-style: (not country or not country.state_ids) and 'display: none'

select.name: state_id
select.t-att-class: 'custom-select form-control has-value' if country else 'custom-select form-control'

option.t-att-selected: s.id == ('state_id' in partner and country and partner['state_id'] != '' and int(partner['state_id']))

div.label: State / Province

div.t-attf-class: container container--small tab-pane fade #{'in active' if tabinfo == 'vehicle' else ''}
container container--small tab-pane fade #{'in active' if tabinfo == 'nomination' else ''}

div.p: Are you sure you want to delete this Address?

a.class: btn btn-link float-right p-0 user_edit_address no-decoration
a.title: Edit this address

div.class: alert alert-info alert-dismissible rounded-0 fade show d-print-none css_editable_mode_hidden

div.div:
Change password | Logout | Joined | | Manage Your Personal Data |
Last seen ago

div.t-attf-class: container custom-tab-edit-mode container--small tab-pane fade #{'in active' if tabinfo == 'personal_data' else ''}

select.name: country_id
select.t-att-class: 'custom-select form-control has-value' if partner.country_id else 'custom-select form-control'

option.t-att-selected: country.id == int(country_id) if country_id else country.id == partner.country_id.id

select.name: x_gender
select.t-att-class: 'custom-select form-control has-value' if partner.x_gender else 'custom-select form-control'

select.name: x_nationality
select.t-att-class: 'custom-select form-control has-value' if partner.x_nationality else 'custom-select form-control'

input.name: x_birthdate
input.t-attf-class: form-control birthDate_datepicker #{'has-value' if partner and partner['x_birthdate'] else ''}

select.name: x_driver_license_type
select.t-att-class: 'custom-select form-control has-value' if partner.x_driver_license_type else 'custom-select form-control'

div.label: Year of issuance of driving license

input.name: x_driver_year_racing_since
input.t-att-class: 'integer form-control has-value' if partner.x_driver_year_racing_since else 'integer form-control'

input.name: x_driver_amount_events
input.t-att-class: 'integer form-control has-value' if partner.x_driver_amount_events else 'integer form-control'

input.name: x_driver_year_last_event
input.t-att-class: 'integer form-control has-value' if partner.x_driver_year_last_event else 'integer form-control'

select.name: x_driver_shirt_size
select.t-att-class: 'custom-select form-control has-value' if partner.x_driver_shirt_size else 'custom-select form-control'

div.t-attf-class: container custom-tab-edit-mode container--small tab-pane fade #{'in active' if tabinfo == 'vehicle' else ''}

select.name: x_vehicle_cat
select.t-att-class: 'custom-select form-control has-value' if partner.x_vehicle_cat else 'custom-select form-control'

input.name: x_vehicle_year_construction
input.t-att-class: 'integer form-control has-value' if partner.x_vehicle_year_construction else 'integer form-control'

input.name: x_vehicle_ccm
input.t-att-class: 'integer form-control has-value' if partner.x_vehicle_ccm else 'integer form-control'

input.name: x_vehicle_cylinder
input.t-att-class: 'integer form-control has-value' if partner.x_vehicle_cylinder else 'integer form-control'

input.name: x_vehicle_horse_power
input.t-att-class: 'integer form-control has-value' if partner.x_vehicle_horse_power else 'integer form-control'

div.t-attf-class: container container--small tab-pane fade #{'in active' if tabinfo == 'nomination' else ''}
